did.unittitle: Lebanon public school class photograph, photographed by Gray & Miller in Lebanon, Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1st Row. L to R. Wm Powell #2, Hill Spalding #2, Tim Russell #3, John Woods #4, Chas. Clesor #5 (?), Edgar Edmonds #7, Alfreed Walls #10 2nd Row, L. to R. P.K. McElroy #4, Robt Lyle #5, Moses Shrodsky #8, Geo. Neubolt #13 3rd Row Blanche Stoy #1, May Kirck #2, Ethel Pyer #3, Lucy Roins #5, Lucia McAfee #7, Addie McElroy #8, Effie McElroy #10, (Mrs. Bruce Eidolen) Maud Newbalt #11, E. Carl Litsey #13. 4th Row - John R. thomas #1, Alice Miller #6, Prof. P. Henry #7.
(Lebanon Public School) Erected in 1885 or 1886 Photo circa 1889 or 1890
